timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't withLabel be true here as well?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        cambpmTriggerDownstream("cambpm-ce/cambpm-sidetrack/${env.BRANCH_NAME}")
          
          
            
                        cambpmTriggerDownstream("cambpm-ce/cambpm-sidetrack/${env.BRANCH_NAME}", true)

replies.bodyText: It's true by default in the shared library
replies.author: yanavasileva

replies.bodyText: Sorry, completely mixed up the default values.
